pr_title: [#1864] Add basic authentication support for the MongoDB based device registry

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather have a bean of type MongoClient being ceated by the config class which can then be used by multiple other beans. FMPOV there is no reason why we need to depend on MongoDbCallExecutor here ...
